availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William G. P. Weaver (Pendleton County, KY, chairmaker)

body.p: Kentucky chairmaker. Kentucky native. Married to Cynthia Rogers Weaver. Father of Elizabeth Weaver, John Weaver, Mary Weaver, Sarah Weaver, Martha Weaver, David Weaver, Lewis R. Weaver, Susan L. Weaver, Amanda Weaver, George W. Weaver, and Stella M. Weaver. Chairmaker in Bracken County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Pendleton County in 1856. Signed a petition to Thomas E. Bramlette on behalf of Sobieski W. Clark in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on April 26, 1865.
